RemediationStrings.Title: Sophos Anti-Virus was not detected.
RemediationStrings.Description: You must have Sophos Antivirus installed on your device to protect it from malware.

Rules.SettingName: Sophos Anti-Virus real time protection enabled

RemediationStrings.Title: Sophos Antivirus real time protection is not enabled
RemediationStrings.Description: Real time protection must be enabled in Sophos to protect your device, please enable this setting.

RemediationStrings.Title: Sophos Antivirus definitions are not up to date.
RemediationStrings.Description: Please update the Sophos Antivirus definitions to ensure you device is protected from malware.
